name: (Paper 4) Cambridge Key English Test (KET7) - Writing Course Test 3
intro: (Level B2) Improve your writing skills with this advanced course designed for the Cambridge KET7 exam. Develop strong written communication by practicing structured compositions, formal and informal responses, and clear articulation of ideas. This course focuses on mastering sentence coherence, logical argumentation, and effective expression to excel in real-world writing tasks.
lessonNames: Write a formal letter to your school principal suggesting ways to improve student facilities. Include your ideas and explain why they are beneficial.
